install.name: HHS Digital Media Syndication
install.author: HHS
install.description: A module for selecting and inserting syndicated content.

param.name: cdccs_source
param.label: Source
param.description: Syndicate content from this source

param.name: cdccs_searchtype
param.label: Select Search Type
param.description: Search by Metadata or by Url

param.name: cdccs_fromdate
param.label: From Date
param.description: Only show titles of content modified since this date

param.name: cdccs_mediatypes
param.label: Media Types
param.description: Select media types to filter titles

param.name: cdccs_topictree
param.label: Topics
param.description: Select topics to filter titles

param.name: cdccs_title
param.label: Title
param.description: Select a title to preview the syndicated content

param.name: cdccs_url
param.label: Url Contains
param.description: Search for content with urls containing this text

param.name: cdccs_stripimages
param.label: Strip Images
param.description: Strip images from returned content

param.name: cdccs_stripscripts
param.label: Strip Scripts
param.description: Strip scripts from returned content

param.name: cdccs_stripanchors
param.label: Strip Anchors
param.description: Strip anchors from returned content

param.name: cdccs_stripcomments
param.label: Strip Comments
param.description: Strip comments from returned content

param.name: cdccs_stripinlinestyles
param.label: Strip Inline Styles
param.description: Strip inline styles from returned content

param.name: cdccs_stripbreaks
param.label: Strip Line Breaks
param.description: Strip line breaks from returned content

param.name: cdccs_imagefloat
param.label: Image Float
param.description: Floats images left or right in some returned content

param.name: cdccs_cssclasses
param.label: CSS Classes (comma separated)
param.description: Comma separated list of CSS classes. Only content within elements with these classes will be returned.

param.name: cdccs_ids
param.label: Element Ids (comma separated)
param.description: Comma separated list of element Ids. Only content within elements with these Ids will be returned.

param.name: cdccs_xpath
param.label: XPath
param.description: An xpath statement defining what should be retrieved from the content

param.name: cdccs_namespace
param.label: Namespace Prefix
param.description: Used to decorate (prefix) the tags and Ids in the results to prevent conflict with existing markup

param.name: cdccs_linkssamewindow
param.label: Links Open Same Window
param.description: Check to have links in content open the same window (default is new window)

param.name: cdccs_width
param.label: Width
param.description: Set the width of various media types

param.name: cdccs_height
param.label: Height
param.description: Set the height of various media types

param.name: cdccs_https
param.label: Use HTTPS
param.description: If checked, the calls to the source to fetch the content for embedding will use https rather than http

param.name: cdccs_encoding
param.label: Encoding
param.description: Encoding for returned content

param.name: cdccs_preview
param.label: Preview
param.description: Preview content
